verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG1: it] [ARG2: a sign rainbow appears over fenway before world series again] we 're used to experiencing wild weather in new england especially when fall begins to transition into winter thanks to the success of the boston red sox over the past two decades we 're also getting used to seeing them play late october baseball at fenway park in boston this coincidence will have red sox fans talking and hoping that it a sign from a higher power a rainbow appeared over fenway park before game 1 of the 2018 world series rainbow boston boston red sox fenway park st louis cardinals
